basics.name: Almas Baktubayev
basics.label: Chief Technology Officer / Technical Lead / Senior Backend Developer
basics.summary: Seasoned technology leader and backend architect with 7+ years of experience transforming complex business challenges into scalable technical solutions. Expert in Python/Django ecosystem, microservices architecture, and DevOps practices. Proven track record of building and leading high-performing engineering teams, driving digital transformation initiatives, and delivering enterprise-grade solutions. Passionate about system integration, automation, and leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create measurable business impact.

work.name: MyCar Group
work.summary: Led technical transformation initiatives with primary focus on system stability, security hardening, and infrastructure resilience for a major automotive technology company.
highlights: Established comprehensive security framework reducing vulnerabilities by 85%
Implemented system monitoring and alerting infrastructure achieving 99.9% uptime
Led security audit and remediation efforts, implementing SAST/DAST scanning in CI/CD pipeline
Architected disaster recovery and backup strategies ensuring business continuity
Deployed infrastructure hardening measures including WAF, DDoS protection, and intrusion detection
Managed cross-functional team of 8+ engineers in delivering mission-critical stability improvements
Established incident response procedures and on-call rotation for 24/7 system reliability
Implemented automated security patching and vulnerability management processes

work.name: MyCar Group
work.summary: Developed robust backend solutions for automotive business processes and system integrations.
highlights: Built RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints serving 50,000+ daily requests
Implemented complex business logic for inventory management and sales automation
Optimized database queries reducing response times by 60%
Integrated third-party services and payment gateways
Contributed to architectural decisions and technical documentation

work.name: OSU Technology LLC
work.summary: Freelance backend development for restaurant technology solutions, focusing on online ordering and payment systems.
highlights: Developed complete backend system for Marrone Rosso restaurant chain
Implemented online ordering platform with takeout and advance reservation capabilities
Built RESTful APIs for order management, kitchen operations, and customer interactions
Integrated payment processing and real-time order tracking systems
Designed scalable architecture to handle peak ordering hours

work.name: dooverTech
work.summary: Developed diverse backend solutions and implemented Kubernetes infrastructure for multiple client projects ranging from e-commerce to IoT surveillance systems.
highlights: Deployed and managed Kubernetes infrastructure for containerized microservices
Built complete backend for 'Woop' online dry cleaning service with order management and processing workflows
Developed urban logistics microservice with intelligent time slot scheduling for customer-convenient pickup/delivery
Created online furniture store platform specializing in barbershop and hair salon equipment
Architected unified backend serving three distinct shashlik ordering platforms with shared infrastructure

Designed IoT surveillance detection system using Raspberry Pi and camera integration - analyzing vehicle license plates, tracking patterns, comparing car models and colors for personal security monitoring

work.name: The Factory
work.summary: Developed backend solutions for a web development studio specializing in interactive web applications and fintech platforms.
highlights: Created online gaming platform for Pepsi marketing campaign with real-time gameplay mechanics
Developed Astra Lombard payment platform - comprehensive lending and payment solution
Integrated acquiring systems processing 600-900 million KZT annual transaction volume
Built secure payment processing infrastructure meeting financial compliance standards
Implemented real-time transaction monitoring and reporting systems

work.name: do-it.kz
work.summary: Developed backend infrastructure for OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) platform that aggregated and analyzed digital footprints to create comprehensive digital profiles.
highlights: Built data collection systems aggregating information from social networks, messengers, and public sources
Developed algorithms for digital profile formation and pattern recognition
Implemented secure data processing pipelines handling sensitive personal information
Created APIs for data retrieval and profile analysis
Designed scalable architecture for processing large volumes of multi-source data

work.name: CLOUD MONEY
work.summary: Developed backend systems for a fintech company specializing in payment systems and financial intermediation.
highlights: Built online quiz game platform with prize draw mechanics and real-time user engagement
Developed document analysis and validation system for customer verification using OCR and pattern recognition
Implemented secure payment processing systems handling sensitive financial data
Created RESTful APIs for payment gateway integrations
Ensured PCI DSS compliance in payment processing workflows

work.name: CLOUD MONEY
work.summary: Developed user-facing interfaces for fintech B2C platform aggregating banking services.
highlights: Built responsive B2C platform aggregating bank offers and financial products
Created intuitive interface allowing customers to compare and select optimal banking solutions
Implemented dynamic filtering and comparison features for financial products
Developed mobile-responsive layouts ensuring cross-device compatibility
Collaborated with UX designers to deliver pixel-perfect implementations
